website_summaries.verdict: This sports bra delivers the ideal amount of support and compression. It also has an athlete-friendly design. Undoubtedly the best of the best.
pros: A must-have for full busted women seeking a sports bra with maximum comfort and support along with minimal bounce
cons: On the more expensive side, but you'll be thankful for the extra investment

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The bra strap broke DURING the second workout. For the amount paid, this should not have happened. I also found that it was not all that supportive as others have raved about. I never write reviews but I do take the time to read them before I make purchases and these 4 and 5 star ratings are highly misleading. ***This bra is overrated, don't waste your money.***
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for great support and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best sports bra out there. I've been using these for 4 years. This bra has excellent support and keeps the girls from bouncing all over the place during running, kickboxing, jumping jacks, etc. It's extremely comfortable and fits perfect. I'm short waisted and wondered if the bottom would be too long, but it's perfect. These bras hold up extremely well (I keep buying new ones because I change sizes not because I've worn them out) and the colors are very cute. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Two

customer_reviews.title: Busty Girls...This is a MUST Buy!
customer_reviews.text: For all of my busty girls out there...and I'm talking DDD and up...this bra is for you. I ordered a 32F/32DDD, which is my current bra size, and it fit perfectly, held the girls in check while running, and is very comfortable. The girls are not squished, but protected and do not move, which is a must. The should straps are padded for comfort. My only issue is the razorback option takes a second person, but I've found that with most convertible style straps. This is a definite must buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Comparison to Lemystere sports bra
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to my fellow Amazonians for their spot-on positive reviews. Look no further if you are well-endowed...period. I will never wear any other type, and as a 34F, be assured have tried others. Fyi I ordered the LeMystere sports bra at the same time for comparison and immediately packed it up for return. That bra was more plunging, like a T shirt bra, offered comparatively less support, and the band was extremely tight, even though I ordered the same size as my LeMystere Dream Tisha regular bra. My regular bra was manufactured in France, but they are made there no longer; unfortunate and perhaps the reason for the discrepancy.
customer_reviews.author: Schnauzerhaus

customer_reviews.title: This bra is wonderful. It fit exactly as expected but I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This bra is wonderful. It fit exactly as expected but I have been fit professionally. Previously I thought I had a 32 band and always wore that but was told I actually have a 30 band. Band size is more important than cup size. This bra is extremely comfortable and holds the girls in very well. It is high quality and a beautiful bra. I love it! Highly highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Like other full-figured reviewers (36D)
customer_reviews.text: I returned this bra. Like other full-figured reviewers (36D), I found the structured cups didn't cover nearly enough of my breast in the upper outside area nearest the underarm. Basically, my breasts just spilled over because there was no bra in that area. The size wasn't the issue -- the bra fit otherwise. It's the cut of the bra that is strange. I hopes based on Amazon reviews, but the bra didn't live up to them.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Gombrich

customer_reviews.title: More "Push-up" than "Sports" for Me
customer_reviews.text: Based on the glowing reviews, I tried 3 combinations of 2 different band/cup sizes in this bra, in my usual range (32D/DD-34D). Unfortunately in all sizes, my breasts were pushed up and out of the outer upper corners, and there was a lot more bounce and exposure than I prefer in a sports bra. Definitely not enough support for running. So much for reviews--it still comes down to personal trial and error. The cups are rigid and I suppose if you don't quite fit the shape, you are out of luck. And, the big brand name printed on the front is ugly. I returned them all and am going back to the Wacoal Sports Bra, which fits me great.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Order one cup size down
customer_reviews.text: I like this sports bra. It fits comfortably, looks cute, and provides the support for my level of workout. But the other reviewers are correct: you need to order at least one cup size smaller than your every day bra. I usually wear a 36G, but the G cup in this bra was too large. I ordered a 36FF and it fits. I also ordered a 36F at the same time in case the FF was too large, but I'm keeping the F since I expect to lose a size in the near future just due to my workouts. The only issue I have with this bra is bounce when I'm doing a higher-impact workout.
customer_reviews.author: AliQat

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: I'm not quite sure how the "83 percent bounce reduction" was calculated but it doesn't really feel accurate. I like this bra and it's comfortable and feels somewhat supportive and keeps the girls looking nice and perky. It works fine for low impact exercises like the stationary bike and elliptical. However, I don't feel as if it would hold up to jumping jacks or jogging. I still feel significant jiggle when I really get going on the bike. It's not enough to warrant a return, but I'm not sure if it's good enough to warrant the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best sports bra. I wear a 32G or 34G and have owned dozens of different sports bras. This is the best. Not quite the support of the Enelle bra, but plenty for my most rigorous gym classes. And there's no squished uniboob. It separates the breasts and somehow makes everything look better. I bought a 34F based on some reviews and it was just a tiny bit small. I kept it and it's fine, but for my 2nd one I ordered a 34FF and it is perfect. Love love love this bra.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: While it is comfortable it doesn't provide any bounce restriction due to the ...
customer_reviews.text: While it is comfortable it doesn't provide any bounce restriction due to the shoulder straps being of a stretchy padded material. If the shoulder straps weren't stretchy this might have a chance at being a decent sports bra for large breasts (32K).
customer_reviews.author: JTKC

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get it to fit after trying three different sizes
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted this bra to work but after trying three different ones, I give up. I followed the advice about converting down a size for the UK fit and first one had lots of space in the cups. Second one, a cup down, did too. Third one, another cup size down had spillage out the sides but funny extra fabric in the boob. I tried all the tricks for filling it up. Anyhow, I give up. Guess my shape doesn't work with it, which is too bad as the reviews made me really hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this bra. I went to Dicks and tried every single high activity "compression" bra they had. None were supportive enough for my 36D size. I put this one on and noticed right away that I am spilling over the sides. The sides do not come up as high as in the photo. I jumped and sure enough...not even close to the support I had hoped. I haven't removed the tags yet. I am considering trying this bra tomorrow when I go to boot camp. I have not found anything comparable to the old Champion compression sports bra
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I love this bra
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra! Not sure why, but my breasts just keep on growing. I outgrow my bras every couple of years. After a reduction 20 years ago, I'm back up to a 30G. I have had this bra in several sizes - ever since I was an E cup. It always fits perfectly - once I get the right size again. I've quit trying other sports bras. This is my favorite!!!
customer_reviews.author: jfkln

customer_reviews.title: Great at first...does not last
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 of these bras over the last 1-2 years. I wanted to have plenty because I work out almost every day. Sadly, these bras do not last considering how expensive they are. Within 3 months, even after hand washing, the underwire has come out of each and every one of them. I am a 36H naturally. It is very impossible to find decent bras, and even harder to find sports bras in my size. I was so optimistic for these to work and after spending well over $150, I'm disappointed and back to square one--trying to find a high impact sports bra in my size :(
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Everything a busty girl could dream of
customer_reviews.text: I have small rib measurements and a large cup and ordered this in 32H. Ladies will know what kind of troubles that means. It wasn't until this product did I truly understand how much I was compromising with other sports bras. The bra is comfortable to wear, flattering, and even works.... All at the same time! There is no digging in on the ribs or shoulders and it isn't tucking my boobs under my arms or compressing them so I can't breathe. I'm excited to try the pink next!
customer_reviews.author: TroubleIn907

customer_reviews.title: Great Bra
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sports bra. I run half marathons and I needed a very supportive sports bra. I wear a 34D in my everyday bra and ordered the same size in this sports bra and it fit perfectly. Just wish they would come out with a tan color.
customer_reviews.author: mitzi926

customer_reviews.title: I love these sports bras
customer_reviews.text: I love these sports bras... im very active person play sports and workout... great support and hold me in while running.. fit runs small for me... usually wear a 36DD ... the panache 36DD fit tight and lityle uncomfortable... and bought a 38 C and 38D... very comfortable... love them both.... highly recommend for high impact sports
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn K. Volner

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bra and everything about it. I can actually jump up and down without holding my boobs in place! NOTE: get properly fitted at a store and even try it on before purchasing online- if possible. I sometimes where a 34DD but after getting fitted in the store, they told me that I needed a 30GG. I wouldn't suggest buying without trying it on first or at least knowing your proper size. Wish this was around when I was a gymnast 15 yrs ago!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca slobig

customer_reviews.title: Finally, support - I want to wear this bra everyday - huge weight off my chest
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all kinds of sports bras, even those for the big-chested, and nothing has given me instant relief like this one. From the moment I tried it on I felt better -- it's easier to sit straighter, even when I'm not exercising. No uniboob, no bounce -- and I even still have sexy cleavage and silhouette. This girl will never put her 30DDs anywhere else! I can start running again!
customer_reviews.author: ModernEsther

customer_reviews.title: Attractive style but didn't feel comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design but it just didn't fit properly. I looked at the sizing info and thought I had followed the guidelines. It was tight at the band, which might have worked out over time, but the cup size was just not going to give me the coverage, especially on the sides. I think the remedy would have been to size up
customer_reviews.author: Gail Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love this :)
customer_reviews.text: This bra is comfy and cute! the racer back clips make it very versatile with different workout tops! it gives my boobs a great shape & lift compared to the other brands I've tried. the ability to control "bounce" i'd give it a 3.5 but hey.... when the girls bounce, not much could stop them... unless you wanna duct tape them :) looking at other colours now -= my first one is grey
customer_reviews.author: laurylaur

customer_reviews.title: The fit is near perfect, there is no overflow or tightness around my ...
customer_reviews.text: Finding a bra for my size (32F) is very difficult. It's IMPOSSIBLE to find in department stores unless special ordered, and even in specialty stores I've not seen many. However, the moment I put on this Panache bra I was pleasantly surprised! The fit is near perfect, there is no overflow or tightness around my chest, and it reduces "bounce". The underwire is hardly noticeable, so it is very comfortable compared to some of my other bras. The Freya Active Underwire Sport WAS my favorite... but this Panache is definitely my new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Bamgbala

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sports bra!
customer_reviews.text: I play football, volleyball, dodgeball, dragon boating, biking, and cross-train at the gym. This bra is, hands down, the best sports bra I've ever used. The separation is perfect--no uniboob, and the compression is glorious. This bra keeps the girls up and running, and wicks well, to boot! I'd recommend this bra with no reservation.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Better than just a sports bra
customer_reviews.text: I am a 34G and it has been ridiculous trying to find a sports bra that fits right. I bought this, and it fit so well and made my boobs look so good that I started wearing it for everyday purposes. I've never had a bra I loved so much. I'm back buying a second one because the underwire on one side of the first one has started to come out (after wearing it practically every day for almost a year).
customer_reviews.author: Jan P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, though expensive. No seams that rub or chafe. Plenty of room under the arms. No fasteners, velcro, etc. to chafe skin. I prefer hook in the back. Front is supportive but not too high. Two toned color helps breakup the look so it is more flattering to 34F chest. I appreciate how the bra has a supportive middle section to support and separate rather than just smoosh. I use for running and Zumba.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Magnusson

customer_reviews.title: On the Small Side
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bra a bit smaller than my usual size, upon the recommendations. YIKES! I have VERY FULL breasts. I needed this much larger than my usual Walcoal size bra.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: The size was a bit funny, I had to return it
customer_reviews.text: This bra was just ok. The size was a bit funny, I had to return it. After I returned it, it felt really bulky and never fit quite right but I dealt with it because its hard to find a decent bra my size. I wore it 3-5 times a week and the under wire broke through in 6 months without any warning.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Maier

customer_reviews.title: Finally a sports bra I like
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Sports Bra in the same size (30F) I order when I'm buying a regular (non-sports) bra. It fit great. It's really snug, but that's the point. Very little bounce when I tested it out. I am optimistic enough that I ordered a second one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: BizDoc

customer_reviews.title: This sports bra is comfy and I like the way it separates each breast but this did ...
customer_reviews.text: This sports bra is comfy and I like the way it separates each breast but this did NOTHING to stop major boob bouncing. I did a few jumping jacks and they were up and down with me. Any major activity in this would have just left me with a sore chest.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

customer_reviews.title: Trampoline, here I come!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally!! I have been looking for a bra that would hold up to my trampoline, and this is it. Everything stays in place, defying gravity and looking rather uplifted. I'm starting to feel younger already..
customer_reviews.author: guitarQuest

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the answer. I have tried on countless numbers of sports bras in the past month. Looking for not just comfort but something to keep the girls in place...I bought this for my 5K. I am a 40DD, its been hard to find a bra that held them down without hurting me terribly or causing a uniboob or just flat out not working. I ran my 5K and was totally unaware of the bra. It was comfortable and there was barely any bounce to speak of. Perfect. Though expensive, this bra is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Drews

customer_reviews.title: A Good Bra Is Hard To Find
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best sports bra in the market, and believe me, I've tried them all. This bra is the perfect fit. The girls stay put, lifted, and perky even when I'm running. Very comfortable. I'm shocked on how great this looks on my bust... and I'm pretty busty. Worth the money. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best sorts bra I've ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I'm running with this bra! This is the best sorts bra I've ever tried. I jogged and mt boobs didn't hurt! Love it! And no uniboob. I'm thrilled with this bra!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Casarella

customer_reviews.title: Love this sports bra
customer_reviews.text: I am a 34FF, before this I have been wearing TWO sports bras to workout! I have been looking for a bra that can keep the girls from bouncing when I am working out. Was doubtful about the 83% bounce reduction after watching the video. I was sold the minute I tried it out and there was no bounce! It's comfortable, supportive and padded in all the right places. Way to go Panache.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just bought this bra!
customer_reviews.text: I like the bra because it gives good support and the only thing I need to know is that if it will smash the chest in any way ? I don't want that. I wear a 32F and I want good support with full coverage. Thank goodness it has hooks in the back to clasp.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this bra
customer_reviews.text: I at first ordered a 40DD and it was too large as I'm normally that size. I ordered a 38 DD and it still didn't fit as good as I wanted. The band was tighter but the cup size was too small. I Had to return because the fit was all off and I didn't want to be stuck with a pricy undergarment that I'm not going to wear.. I'm sticking with my Enell bra for now. The only thing I wanted was a different way to secure the bra as the front closure on the Enell gets bothersome after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Mish83

customer_reviews.title: Best Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many sports bras and this is the first one that holds my 34F girls comfortably. It is so comfortable, I'm wearing as my everyday bra. The bra gives my breasts a very nice shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Underwire popped out
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Panache sports bra. I love how it fits and it did a good job of supporting my 34 G chest. Unfortunately, the underwire in the second bra i bought popped out and cut me while I was running. I tried contacting the company. I feel they should stand behind their product. At this time , they have not returned my e-mail.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Pretty, lucky girl
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid runner and recently had to upgrade my sports bras with the birth of my baby for my new 34F cup size. I've already logged many miles in this bra (the purple one) and find it very supportive and the girls are comfortably held in place. That it works solidly and yet doesn't look like something worn under a retirement home velour track suit is miraculous.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Sports Bra Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 38G and have found the bra to be amazingly supportive. I have never found a better sports bra.
customer_reviews.author: A. Titel

customer_reviews.title: best sports bra I have found
customer_reviews.text: for all you women who are joining the gym this month especially if you have a fuller bust (cup sizes up to H), this is by far the best sports bra I have found. The shape is a little more coney than i prefer but it definitely keeps the girls in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Sports Bra:
customer_reviews.text: I own this bra in black, white, and gray. My exercises of choice are yoga, dogs, and gardening. I am a nurse by trade, and do a lot of physical movement, moving patients and equipment, putting on about 7-8 miles per shift. As a 32G, finding a quality supportive bra is difficult. By far, this is the best style I have owned!
customer_reviews.author: Michigan girl

customer_reviews.title: BEST sports bra ever!
customer_reviews.text: One thing I cannot stand is movement of the "girls" during exercise. Unfortunately, things are not as they used to be with age and weight loss, so the girls need some serious support and this bra does it. I ordered the same size bra that my Victoria Secret bras are and this fit the same way. I have lost a bit more weight since I got the VS bras so if I order another Panache bra (and I plan on doing so), I will order a cup size smaller. I cannot rave enough about this bra.
customer_reviews.author: Annabar

customer_reviews.title: Great Bra!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this sports bra! I do kickboxing and a lot of cardio and it really keeps my 34Gs in place. It is comfortable and I actually have other ladies ask me after class what kind of bra am I wearing! So I highly recommend this bra!
customer_reviews.author: L Manning

customer_reviews.title: misleading size
customer_reviews.text: I'm nursing, so my boobs are larger than they once were. With my nursing bra, I was a 34G. When this came. It was HUGE. way larger than any other 34G nursing bra.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Atizol

customer_reviews.title: Best investment EVER
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and I'm in love! I'm a 32F so finding a sports bra with support and comfort has been very hard. I barely move while working out and it's super snug without being constricting. I would've paid twice as much for this because it's well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mhollinshead

customer_reviews.title: Best fit ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after being sized to replace my old sports bra. Amazing fit great hold, keeps the girls in place I am a 36H will be ordering another one soon. P.S. ladies if you could post your size when giving a review it helps to better judge the product thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: LadyKane

customer_reviews.title: Love this bra will order again soon
customer_reviews.text: I am a 36 H/I and that's what i order. It is true to size. But if you want a tighter fit order a 34 H. Love this bra will order again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but it is NOISY!
customer_reviews.text: I have this bra in black. I'm 5'1" and 113 lbs, 34D/DD and I love it - there is almost zero bounce. With the racerback optional clasp on the back hooked, and the straps as short as the go, I can run full out without worries. The only downfall is that everyone else can hear my bra. Yes, that's right, they can HEAR it. It SQUEAKS when the clasp is engaged to make it into the racerback. It is not supportive enough without clasping it, so I have no choice but to squeak away while I run!
customer_reviews.author: A. Farley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sports Bra
customer_reviews.text: I am a 32H in all of my bras but for whatever reason that was wayyyyy too big for me in this bra. However the 32G fit perfectly. I have many heavy duty sports bras (mostly from shock absorber) and while the other ones I have work great for running, etc.; this one is the absolute best. It really straps the girls in and it makes it comfortable for me to run without a shirt without feeling inappropriate (in the Texas heat). I'm very happy with this bra and in time I will probably repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Inesa

customer_reviews.title: Felt the Burn, unfortunately...
customer_reviews.text: This is an atractive bra, and actually helps maintain an attractive silhouette, but 2 miles into a run, the band beneath my chest started chafing, and the skin was worn raw by the time I finished at 4 miles. I'm a 36D and pushing 50, so maybe my breasts are bouncier than they should be, but I was really hoping this bra would work better than it did.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crispin

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for large cups and high-impact sports
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but not supportive enough for running with a D cup. I'm surprised how many people say this bra is supportive. I never wear it. After trying a bunch of other sports bras, so far the best has been the Moving Comfort Juno bra.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ross

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 Band Size OR 1 Cup Size Bigger
customer_reviews.text: I am a 30E (UK sizing) and the band is very tight even on the last hook. The bra cuts low on the sides so I have spillage on the sides. The bra also gives a torpedo shape to the chest. However, I do feel that this bra would be adequate for running when hooked in the back (razorback). Because return shipping to HerRoom.com is not free I will not be exchanging, just dealing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate779

customer_reviews.title: Help bra doesn't even come close to fitting!
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset. I spent 70 on abra that is 3 time too small in the cup and so tight around it almost tore my skin. something is terribly wrong with this bra. I ordered a 32 D and the cup looks like a AA. Can I exchange it? It took a week to get it so now I will be 2 weeks without a bra. And I have no idea what to order because I have always been a 32 D. Given this bra I would have to go with a 34FFF. What the heck!!!!!!!!!!! HELP this bra has to be mislabeled!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can run now!!! Comfortable and it really works.
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted to take up running for a long time but just couldn't because it was too painful. I tried regular sports bras, doubling up on bras and I bought the Enell that Oprah raved about and it was very expensive. That thing is like a straight jacket. I couldn't breathe when I had it on because it uses compression to squish you and squash you. This bra doesn't squish. It holds the girls in place. It is so comfortable I could wear it all day long and it doesn't look freakish like the Enell does. This thing literally changed my life and made it possible for me to run.
customer_reviews.author: Spoonfulofsugar

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra. This is the first sports bra I have ever owned that is supportive, reduces bounce and stays put. It is most supportive when it is clipped into a racer back. I feel confident going to the gym now especially with my breast feeding sized chest. It is soft, comfortable and breathes well. I plan in purchasing another to rotate use.
customer_reviews.author: Lemebe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My trainer recommended this bra and I love it! It is very difficult to find a sports bra that actually fits! I do not have to wear two bras when I run and you don't have a uniboob! It is also very comfortable. It's perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Carter

customer_reviews.title: panache vs my wacoel
customer_reviews.text: The panache was a tiny bit larger. It seems to be more comfortable under the arm pits. Well worth the money. I do like the wacoel also. Would purchase both again.
customer_reviews.author: radena

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: My problems began immediately after the second wash when the underwire popped through. Next, I realized the bra offered no support and overall, the quality is not very good. I have a large bust and I was told this was the perfect bra for me (not purchased through Amazon). I obviously was lied to. Therefore, I do NOT recommend this bra.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Very odd fit!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 38 D and the it came with a tag that said D - H? The top stuck out from my chest 2 inches. How can a bra cup fit that many sizes? Obviously it didn't. I sent it back and kept the Wacoal, much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!! Answered Prayer for a Top Heavy Mama!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 38E, this bra has allowed me to get back into working out and even.. running. It is comfortable, looks great and best of all, it works. It holds it all in without squishy you out the sides so your arms are not hitting the sides of yoru breasts while working out & lifts and seperates so you don't wind up with a "Uni-boob". Hands down the best bra of any sort that I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sports bra
customer_reviews.text: I am a 32F and this is the best fitting (sports) bra I have found. I love the fact that the hooks attach on the back but I heard that it loosens after a while if you use it a lot. I am obsessed with having my bras fit perfect and the separate cups don't make me feel 'squished' and the contouring just helps minimize bounce greatly. I'm about to buy my third one bc I am tired of using the "i don't have a clean sports bra" excuse for not working out.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

product_meta.title: Panache Women's Underwire Sports Bra
product_meta.description: The ultimate sports bra especially designed for the full busted women combines comfort, maximum support and reduces bounce by 83 percent. Wide padded straps disperse pressure on the shoulders for extra comfort. Smooth inner molded cups reduce friction and improve comfort. Underwire are wrapped in silicone and sewn between fabric layers for comfortable support. Firm underband anchors the bra to the body. Lightweight microfiber fabric wicks moisture away from the skin and breathable mesh panels keep skin cool. Rather than compressing your breasts against your rib cage like most sports bras, panache sports bra individually encapsulates each one-lifting, shaping and supporting from all sides.
feature_bullets: Underwire sport bra featuring ventilating mesh panels at shoulders and bust
Logo at front band. Wide cushioned shoulder straps
UK sized bra with smooth shape with flat seams
